title: 【TVB合約戰，最後7日】每日洗版任務 - 家匠TMF (實惠)

replies.msg:
12月12日*，就係TVB 2020年廣告簽約deadline
廣告商一旦簽約，TVB穩賺！
最後7日，求下你哋唔好放過TVB！
*12月12日係early bird deadline，12月13日為真deadline

被TVB投訴截圖侵權，iOS用家暫時睇唔到原本TG channel
iOS用家請加入：https://t.me/sayno2tvb2

抗爭要堅持，屌柒TVB成習慣
只需每日幾秒，救助被洗腦藍絲&老豆老母
【抵制CCTVB 每日任務】
1.派嬲
2.洗版
3.推post
4.罷買
5. 互like留言，推上FB留言熱門 (新嘗試！)

是日精選@5 Dec 2019
家匠TMF (實惠)
https://www.facebook.com/TMFhk.Ltd
https://www.facebook.com/priceritehk
FB search:
TMFhk.Ltd
priceritehk

※留言template
留言重點係全力阻止廣告商簽訂下年合約
無綫新聞，歪曲事實，出賣港人！本人明白貴公司或已簽訂今年合約，未能即時撤回廣告，故暫時罷用。請貴公司承諾不簽訂2020 TVB廣告合約，不以無綫藝人代言，否則將列入「永久抵制名單」，永不錄用。



講下臭屎
家匠TMF由實惠分拆出
老細關百豪係上海市政協常委

產品質量唔多掂
1️⃣ 椅腳有斷裂風險，需回收
2️⃣ 無做法定除舊，違反《產品環保責任條例》被定罪

[Source]
bit.ly/2OALtKk
bit.ly/2KRw07Y



歡迎用呢幅圖留言
https://na.cx/i/OfSLMAB.jpg






記得bookmark: TVB廣告客戶名單！！
消費前諗清楚
http://bit.ly/2P7cPeD
－－－－－－－
請即follow:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/sayno2tvb/
IG: #sayno2tvb
TG 綜合狙擊頻道: https://t.me/sayno2tvb
TG 綜合狙擊頻道 (後備): https://t.me/sayno2tvb2
TG 抵制綜合組: https://t.me/sayno2cctvb
TG CCTVB記者實時位置狙擊頻道: https://t.me/nomoretvb

英國美國加拿大都攻擊緊中國
但啲tweets無人推
Rt + like + reply

Twitter組24小時keep住更新
幫手retweet
㩒入👉https://t.me/TwitterHelpBot
然後打/task2 攞任務
做任務呀

【終極任務⚔️50大廣告商 - 總公司終結篇】
[Mission 14 of 14]

話咁快嚟到終結篇！Fans 講得好，TVB呃我哋老母，我哋就搞返廣告商嘅老母🤪，今晚我哋一齊衝出香港🇭🇰，向世界出發🇺🇸🇯🇵🇩🇪🇨🇭✈️

我哋準備咗各個廣告商嘅外國母公司，俾大家盡情轟炸⚡️
⚠️大家代表【香港人】，記得【講英文】👱🏻‍♂️👱🏻‍♀️，同埋【禮貌啲】呀🙏🏻

💎是日精選廣告商1️⃣5️⃣個阿媽:
1️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/FrieslandCampina
2️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/HiPPDeutschland
3️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/Danone
4️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/megmilk.snowbrand
5️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/proctergamble
6️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/Nestle
7️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/GSK
8️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/Mars
9️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/FANCL.Official
🔟 https://www.facebook.com/corp.kao
1️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/mentholatumrub
1️⃣2️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/Abbott
1️⃣3️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/discoverRB
1️⃣4️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/WyethNutrition
1️⃣5️⃣ https://www.facebook.com/jnj

⚔️想知邊個仔係邊個阿媽/補做/一次過做任務⚔️
👉🏻50大廣告商任務時間表👈🏻
https://bit.ly/2ryhivM

📮一次過Send Email最有效!!📮
📤電郵清單及範本📥
https://bit.ly/2XVYXVk

♨️【留言template，英文版】
As a loyal customer of your brands/products, this is my sincere advice to your Hong Kong branch/distributor NOT to advertise on TVB (Television Broadcast Ltd), a pro-Beijing TV channel of Hong Kong that often reports biased or fake news in in favour of Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and Hong Kong Government to mislead audiences. HKers are currently boycotting the brands and products appear on TVB advertisement. If your HK branch/ distributor renews the advertisement contract with TVB for 2020, your brands/products are going to be blacklisted permanently, the blacklist (with the negative news) will be printed in a large quantity and distributed to the public. The majority of HKers have resentment and grudges against TVB, please consider to advertise on other media platforms or TV channels, otherwise we would choose the alternative brands/products that have been cancelled contract with TVB.

正
喺tvb 落廣告仲用tvb artist 做代言人真係要有報應
攪掂

你覺得我地會放過你咩

誤導觀眾唔洗付出代價呀
有民主女神Ali做代言喎
Push
